text: Agar jake az hamsaroni sumo ʙa suji kofiron raft, on goh sumo [dar cang ʙar onon piruz suded va] ʙa intiqom az kofiron ʙarxosted, pas, ʙa kasone, ki hamsaronason [ʙa suji kuffor] raftaand, hammonandi on ciro, ki xarc kardaand, [az ƣanoim] ʙipardozed; va az Allohe, ki sumo ʙa U imon dored, parvo kuned
